The screenshot with Bordo Color Theme, etc is a bit misleading though :) 17:13  would be good to detail what is a flavor technically 17:13  thx 17:22  has joined #xwiki 17:22  has joined #xwiki 17:22  gdelhumeau: better :) 17:23  how do you recognize a flavor? some metadata in the pom.xml? 17:23  I remember I talked about it w/ thomas but I don't remember the details 17:24  ah great :) 17:24   flavor 17:24  thanks! 17:24  :) 17:26  vmassol: I wanted to write "built with maven" 17:27  it told you because you are currently editing :) 17:27  dione 17:27  done 17:27  IMO we should use "Flavor" eveywhere instead of"flavor" 17:27  because it has a specific meaning to use 17:27  it's not the common word "flavor" 17:27  s/use/us/ 17:34  gdelhumeau: s/extension/Extension :) 18:03  has quit 18:06  has quit 18:11  has quit 18:23  has left #xwiki 18:36  has quit 19:54  has quit 19:59  has quit 20:05  has quit 20:14  has quit 21:09  has joined #xwiki 21:58  has quit 22:14  has quit 22:27  has joined #xwiki 23:09  has quit 23:09  has joined #xwiki 23:21  has quit
